title: Making Mistakes
description: What do you do when you’ve made a mistake you wish you could take back? Make more, because you have nothing left to lose.I met my match in Levi. We’re both used to playing games, doing what we want when we want. Neither of us expected to fall for the other in spite of our mistakes. I crave the things he does to me, how he makes me feel. I made a mistake, but so did he.We’re both liars, but the biggest liar of all is the one that’s been there all along.No matter what I have to do or how dirty I have to get, Dean is going down.I’m doing this for myself, to atone for my mistakes, to get back at the boy who thinks he’s untouchable, and for my roommate, who isn’t strong enough to stand on her own.When you’ve played the game so much, mistakes come a dime a dozen.Love might just be the biggest mistake of them all.Making Mistakes is the second and final book in a M/F duet, and it includes steamy scenes. There are mentions and scenes dealing with self-harm, along with some bullying. If you’re looking for a story with perfect characters, look somewhere else.
author: Candace Wondrak
